data.title: Ford Dealer Boston, MA
data.meta_description: Your local Boston, MA Ford Dealer, Watertown Ford. Find a Ford for Sale near Boston, MA at your local Ford Dealership. Ford Cars, Trucks, SUVs, Service and Auto Parts. We offer the latest $0 Down Ford Lease Deals in MA, Offers and Specials. Located Minutes from Needham, MA and Winchester, MA.
data.text:
At Watertown Ford, we focus on making every visit quick and seamless. We want you to leave the dealership feeling taken care of and with the right car, truck, or SUV for your lifestyle. Our selection of new and used Ford vehicles has something for everybody. After the sale, we don't stop providing exceptional service. Watertown Ford is a full-service dealer with a knowledgeable sales staff, certified technicians, a well-stocked parts department, and a commercial truck center.

We strive to be the best and have been awarded for our efforts. We're an Edmunds Five Star Dealer and have collected the Ford President's Award. Watertown Ford is locally owned by the Melkonian Family who goes beyond business to proudly support non-profit organizations doing critical work here at home.

Selection and Price

The inventory at Watertown Ford contains over 250 new Ford vehicles including the popular F-150, Super Duty, Escape, Explorer, and Fusion. In addition, we offer a selection of pre-owned cars and trucks. We know that our customers are busy and don't always have time to come into the dealership. That is why we post each vehicle online with up to 30 photos and a full video tour. When you shop at Watertown Ford, we want you to shop your way.

Whether you have already selected your vehicle online or need some help in nailing down the right options, our friendly staff is here to help. They'll listen to your needs and then work with you to find the perfect vehicle. You can also rest assured that our prices are fair and competitive. Before you buy, we want you to have all the information, including the price.

Elite Service

We are committed to complete customer satisfaction. When you buy a new or pre-owned Ford from us, you are also getting our commitment to provide exceptional service for years to come. Our new Waltham service center offers elite Ford Service to the greater Boston area. Our trained Ford Certified service technicians have years of expertise maintaining Ford vehicles. In addition to this experience, they also stay educated on the latest technologies and advancement, so that no matter what age your vehicle is, we'll be able to perform the necessary repairs.

While you wait for your car or truck to be serviced, we want you to be comfortable. In our customer lounge, you'll find free Wi-Fi, snacks, and beverages with inviting seating areas. Even while you wait, we want you to feel at home.

Giving Back

As a locally owned and operated business, Watertown Ford is committed to supporting the community where we live and work. We provide support to Watertown Boys and Girls Club, The Lion's Club, and Toys for Tots.

Watertown Ford is a part of the Greater Boston Community. We focus on treating each of our customers as a neighbor. Our local roots keep us grounded here, striving to provide you with the best service experience on each visit. From sales to service to community involvement, we are committed to the communities we call home. Whatever your automotive needs, you will be well taken care of at Watertown Ford.
